name: cheapest_room
description: when the user wants to see cheapest room, than no need any argument just call, but if user want cheapest about some category only, categoryName argument needed.

categoryName.description: choose the categoryName according to category name list : beach, trending, beachfront, earthhome, luxe, amazingView, design, pool, tiny, historic, countryside, omg, surfing | wow category equal to omg
